message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not being too generous yet.
You're not being too generous yet? Let's try to meet in the middle!
You're right, let's meet in the middle... but I'll get a slight edge.
You're trying to edge me out, but I'll try to take the lead this time.
You want to take the lead? I'll give you a chance, but I'm not giving up yet.
You're not giving up, I won't either. I'll try to take the lead for real this time.
You want to take the lead for real? I'll give you a chance, but I'm not going down without a fight.
It's getting serious now. I'll take a risk and try to take control of the negotiation.
This is my last offer. I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
It's all or nothing now. I'll take the risk and try to get the majority of the money.
This is my final offer. I'll accept a slightly smaller share to end the game fairly.
